## Hummus  

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| ~3 cups  | 40-70 min | N/A | 


### Ingredients:

- 1 cup dried garbanzo/chickpeas<
- 2-3 cloves of garlic
- 4 TBSP sesame seeds
- 1 TBSP oil (olive oil, sesame oil)
- juice from 1 lemon
- Salt to taste

### Directions 

- Soak beans in water for 8 hours</li>
- Put beans into Instant Pot with 1&frac12; cup water
- Cook on high for 18 minutes, natural release of pressure (~20 minutes)
- Put contents (beans and liquid) as well as all other ingredients into blender at low speed for 45-60 seconds

Can make without soaking beans by putting directly into instant pot for 60 minutes and ~3 cups of water
